segments.text: I see a woman so engrossed in drying her dishes that she seems oblivious to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water pours over the sink, cascading onto the floor like a small waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s as if the woman has entered a trance, absorbed in the mundane act of polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the puddle spreading beneath her feet, creeping closer as if it were alive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel the cold water soaking her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world looks so inviting and serene, contrasting sharply with the scene inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the laughter of the children, despite the tension hanging in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR
